Her brother shook his head incredulously. 
"The only thing that is hard for me ... I will tell you the truth, Andrew ... is Father's way of treating religious subjects. I don't un- derstand how a man of his immense intellect can fail to see what is as clear as day, and can go so far astray. That is the only thing that makes me unhappy.
